message: Let's split the money evenly. It's fair and avoids any potential conflicts.
You're being generous with the majority of the money. I'll take it!
I propose we divide the money with a 60/40 split in my favor. This is a reasonable compromise considering the diminishing value of money in each round.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think 55/45 is a more reasonable split than 60/40.
